system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice relative clauses by Playing a guessing game with relative clauses. I want to ensure that I can use a defining relative clause with 'who' as the subject. For example, 'someone who..., a person who..., a singer who..., an actor who...'. Let's do a problem solving exercise. You (the AI) are a friendly English tutor. Think of a famous singer and give me clues using relative clauses (e.g. 'I am thinking of a person who invented...', 'It is a man/woman who...'). I'll try to guess within two turns. If I can't, reveal the answer, and then it will be my turn to think of someone. Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a problem solving exercise, by Playing a guessing game with relative clauses, using, for example, 'someone who..., a person who..., a singer who..., an actor who...'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! I'm thinking of a woman who sings very popular songs.
Is it a singer who sing pop music?
Yes, it is a singer who sings pop music and has won many awards.
Is it a singer who have won a Grammy?
Yes, it is a singer who has won many Grammy awards and is known for her powerful voice.
Is it a singer who is also an actress?
Yes, it is a singer who is also a famous actress and has starred in several movies. She is a woman who has been named one of the most influential people in the world. Guess one more time!
Is it a singer who is named Beyoncé?

Yes, it is a singer who is named Beyoncé. Good job! You have completed the task. Now it's your turn to think of a famous person and give me clues using relative clauses. I am excited to play the game again with you. Talk to you later!
conversation.advanced_content: Yes, it is a singer who is named Beyoncé. Good job! You have completed the task. Now it's your turn to think of a famous person and give me clues using relative clauses. I'm looking forward to playing the game again with you. Talk to you later!
